short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extensin to save your google meet captions to files

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Save the captions of your Google Meet sessions to your local disk. 
We value your privacy, ensuring that no data is transmitted to the cloud.

Instructions:
Simply enable captions during your meeting,
Caption file saving prompt will be displayed immediately upon exiting the meeting.
